channel.title: Custom Hp bars in rong place
channel.description: so i was follwing this tut http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/336935-pi-new-minimap-orbs-7.html so when i logged into my server the bars was in the rong place here is a pic and the 99 i in the rong place its the section whtiht the red square around it [img]http://i1337.photobucket.com/albums/o670/Christian_Mark_Zack_Harrison/Capture_zps044cc4bc.png[/img]

item.title: Custom Hp bars in rong place
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

TheTutMan:

i know its that i carnt get theam into the right place

Okay… Here’s how you can position them where ever you want.

217 = x positioning
124 = y positioning
If you know the difference between horizontal and vertical, the x is horizontal and the y is vertical. If you don’t, x is left and right and y is up and down. If I change (217, 124) to (216, 124), the sprite will move left 1 pixel. If I change (217, 124) to (217, 123), it will move the sprite up 1 pixel and vice versa for the both of those. After reading this carefully, you should be able to position sprites correctly now.

Read full topic
item.source: Custom Hp bars in rong place

item.title: Custom Hp bars in rong place
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

These are the sprites you need to move for the HP one:

ORBS[1].drawSprite(199, 14);//This one ORBS[2].drawSprite(203, 17);//This one ORBS[0].drawSprite(203, 17);//This one if(health <= 20){ if(loopCycle % 20 < 10){ ORBS[3].drawSprite(200, 126);//This one } } else { ORBS[3].drawSprite(200, 126);//This one }

And these are the sprites you need to move for the prayer one:

ORBS[1].drawSprite(218, 14);//This one ORBS[4].drawSprite(222, 17);//This one ORBS[0].drawSprite(222, 17);//This one if(prayer <= 25) { if(loopCycle % 20 < 10) { ORBS[5].drawSprite(217, 124);//This one } } else { ORBS[5].drawSprite(217, 124);//This one }

Read full topic
item.source: Custom Hp bars in rong place

item.title: Custom Hp bars in rong place
item.dc:creator: @TheTutMan TheTutMan
item.description:
@TheTutMan wrote:

Ive messed around whith it but dont work still plz help asap

This is the code i have [code]public int getOrbFill(int statusInt){
int fill = 99;
int diff;
if(statusInt > 99){
return 0;
} else if(statusInt < 1){
return 100;
}
diff = fill - statusInt;
return diff;
}

public void drawHP() {
	int health;
	String OrbDirectory = signlink.findcachedir()+"/Sprites/Orbs/";
	String cHP = RSInterface.interfaceCache[4016].message; cHP = cHP.replaceAll("%","");
	int currentHP = Integer.parseInt(cHP);
	String mHP = RSInterface.interfaceCache[4017].message; mHP = mHP.replaceAll("%","");
	int maxHP2 = Integer.parseInt(mHP);
	health = (int)(((double)currentHP / (double)maxHP2) * 100D);
	ORBS[0] = new Sprite(OrbDirectory+"ORBS 0.PNG", 27, getOrbFill(health));
	ORBS[1].drawSprite(199, 14);
	ORBS[2].drawSprite(203, 17);
	ORBS[0].drawSprite(203, 17);
	if(health <= 20){
		if(loopCycle % 20 < 10){
			ORBS[3].drawSprite(200, 126);
		}
	} else {
		ORBS[3].drawSprite(200, 126);
	}
	int X = 188;
	int Y = 152;
	smallText.method382(getOrbTextColor(health), X, RSInterface.interfaceCache[4016].message, Y, true);
}

public void drawPrayer() {
	int prayer;
	String OD = signlink.findcachedir()+"/Sprites/Orbs/";
	String cPR = RSInterface.interfaceCache[4012].message;
	int currentPR = Integer.parseInt(cPR);
	String mPR = RSInterface.interfaceCache[4013].message;
	int maxPR2 = Integer.parseInt(mPR);
	prayer = (int)(((double)currentPR / (double)maxPR2) * 100D);
	ORBS[0] = new Sprite(OD+"ORBS 0.PNG", 27, getOrbFill(prayer));
	ORBS[1].drawSprite(218, 14);
	ORBS[4].drawSprite(222, 17);
	ORBS[0].drawSprite(222, 17);
	if(prayer <= 25) {
		if(loopCycle % 20 < 10) {
			ORBS[5].drawSprite(217, 124);
		}
	} else {
		ORBS[5].drawSprite(217, 124);
	}
	int X = 206;
	int Y = 154;
	smallText.method382(getOrbTextColor(prayer), X, RSInterface.interfaceCache[4012].message, Y, true);
}[/code]

Read full topic
